resources.string: Please select the files to upload
Are you sure you want to upload the files?
Please give SensorPoller the permission to display over other apps

Once you click \"Start\", this app collects data from your phone\'s gyroscope, accelerometer, light sensor, proximity sensor, microphone, touch events on the touchscreen and if your face is visibile from the front camera. You can stop the data collection at any time by pressing \"Stop\". The microphone records sound for 2 seconds every 10 seconds. The camera takes a photo every 10 seconds, scans for a face, and saves a 0 if it doesn\'t see any faces, 1 if it does. No photos are saved. When you decide to upload your data, it is saved anonomously on an online server for data collection. We have no way of recognising who the data belongs to, once it is stored on the online server.
